radiographic_examinations.findings: Mild bibasilar atelectasis; no pleural or pericardial effusion. Multiple appendicoliths at the base of the appendix with a fluid collection in the right lower quadrant suggesting perforated appendicitis. The fluid collection measures 3.1 x 3.2 x 4.8 cm, with associated inflammatory fat stranding and small free fluid. Mildly thickened terminal ileum, small volume ascites. No significant intraabdominal free air. Remaining small and large bowel unremarkable. No concerning osseous lesions, focal degenerative changes at L5-S1 level.
